description: A Verbatim classic, our Store 'n' Go USB drives offer a convenient cap-less design and a reliable name you've come to trust! Compatible with all USB ports, the Store 'n' Go gives you the ability to capture your data in one small, convenient location and move that information with you throughout the day, from home to car and office. The retractable housing easily slides the connector in and out - no cap to lose! For sensitive files, these drives offer password protection for your peace of mind. Verbatim's Store 'n' Go USB drives carry a Limited Lifetime Warranty., Retractable USB connector means no cap to lose, Password security feature protects sensitive data*, Compatible with Windows 7 and Vista, Limited lifetime warranty *works with Windows operating systems only
title: Verbatim Store 'n' Go 4 GB USB 2.0 Flash Drive, Red 95236
